mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_film f join tb_genre g on (f.genre_id = g.id) where title_kor like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or title_eng like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select f.*, g.name, fi.change_name from tb_film f join tb_genre g on (f.genre_id = g.id) left outer join tb_detail_film df on (df.film_id = f.id) left outer join tb_film_image fi on (df.id = fi.dfilm_id) where title_kor like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or title_eng like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select g.* from (select distinct genre_id from tb_film) f join tb_genre g on (g.id = f.genre_id) order by genre_id asc
select * from tb_film order by id
select count(*) from tb_film f join tb_like l on (f.id = target_id) where user_id = #{id} and type = 1
select f.*, g.name from tb_film f join tb_like l on (f.id = target_id) join tb_genre g on (f.genre_id = g.id) where user_id = #{id} and type = 1 order by l.id asc

select film_id, title_kor, avg_star, release_year, genre_id, name, change_name from (select * from vi_film_avg_star) a where a.genre_id in (select r.genre from (select genre, prefer, row_number() over (order by prefer desc) as rank from (select g.id as genre, count(*) as prefer from tb_like l join tb_film f on (f.id = l.target_id) join tb_genre g on (f.genre_id = g.id) where user_id = #{id} group by g.id)) r where r.rank = 1) and rownum <= 5 union select film_id, title_kor, avg_star, release_year, genre_id, name, change_name from (select * from vi_film_avg_star) a where a.genre_id in (select r.genre from (select genre, prefer, row_number() over (order by prefer desc) as rank from (select g.id as genre, count(*) as prefer from tb_like l join tb_film f on (f.id = l.target_id) join tb_genre g on (f.genre_id = g.id) where user_id = #{id} group by g.id)) r where r.rank = 2) and rownum <= 5 union select film_id, title_kor, avg_star, release_year, genre_id, name, change_name from (select * from vi_film_avg_star) a where a.genre_id in (select r.genre from (select genre, prefer, row_number() over (order by prefer desc) as rank from (select g.id as genre, count(*) as prefer from tb_like l join tb_film f on (f.id = l.target_id) join tb_genre g on (f.genre_id = g.id) where user_id = #{id} group by g.id)) r where r.rank = 3) and rownum <= 5 order by genre_id asc, avg_star desc
select distinct production_country from tb_film order by production_country asc
select distinct release_year from tb_film order by release_year asc

select rownum, r.* from (select * from vi_film_avg_star fas JOIN TB_FILM F ON (fas.FILM_ID = F.ID) JOiN tb_detail_film df ON(fas.film_id = df.id) join tb_film_image fi on(fas.film_id=fi.id) where fas.release_year = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') order by fas.film_id desc) r where rownum <= 10
